RACE.RACE_TEXT: All American Futurity Trial RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 1 440 Y Dirt CR: 82. Futurity Trial Purse 10000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS THAT WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE TO THE 2023 ALL AMERICAN QUARTER HORSE FUTURITY. Weight: 124 lbs. All horses must enter for the trials on Friday August 4, 2023 by 11:00 A.M. and pay $1,200 entry fee, if they are to run in the tri als. Late nominations of $50,000 (includes all fees) will be accepted at time of entry into the trials. The five fastest times from the trials each day will qualify for the finals. There will be no Also Eligible List. still eligible at time of entry into the trials, by paying the $1,200 entry fee. The five fastest times from the trials each day will qualify for the finals. There will be no Also Eligible List NOTE: All races this day day will be trials, first post time may change due to the number of races.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CORNER POCKET 123 steady bid, all out. VISA vanned off. SIX FAMOUS EAGLES vied throughout, game. RAIDER POWER broke in. ITS A RUIDOSO WEDDIN stumbled start. GADJAL hopped, pushed in. JESS KNEW bobbled start. JET BLACK DOME no threat. PRINCE KLAUS lost footing, off slow.

ENTRY.NAME: Raider Power
ENTRY.OWNER: Coleman Randy Willingham Gary and Roark Ross

ENTRY.NAME: Visa
ENTRY.OWNER: Simmons Racing Wootan Racing and Beasley Roger K

ENTRY.NAME: Prince Klaus
ENTRY.OWNER: Martinez Jaime and Rivera Quarter Horse Racing Inc

SASSIN FIRE bumped start. ESCAPE ROOM broke in. CHEETOH broke in. ALEBRIJE broke in, bobbled. KOLLATERAL bobbled start.
